channel.title: Other on All opinions are a sample size of one
channel.description: Recent content in Other on All opinions are a sample size of one

item.title: "Not writing" is still writing.
item.description: Here’s something I’m learning as I attempt to write more often… There’s a lot of “not writing” that happens in the early stages of writing. While that’s probably obvious to more seasoned writers, it’s something I’m just now realizing has been a road block for me. It takes time to formulate thoughts, reason through ideas, articulate concepts and put them down on a page. As a result, that page stays blank for a long time (or gets littered with useless fragments).

item.title: Hello, world.
item.description: Finally starting a blog. Thank you to Leticia Portella and Saul Shanabrook for pushing to make it happened. I’m planning to use this site to share three major types of content. I’ll announce software that I’ve published or review software someone else published. I’ll highlight things I come across in basic science and research domains. Since my background is in science, I’ll use this blog to stay connected to that community.
